description: From Middle English *sayl-makere, equivalent to sail +â€Ž maker. Cognate with Saterland Frisian Sailmoaker, West Frisian seilmakker, Dutch zeilmaker, German Low German Seilmaker, German Segelmacher, Danish sejlmager, Swedish segelmakare.

entries.meaning: One whose occupation is to make or repair sails.
(US, naval) An officer in the United States navy who takes charge of the sails.
